title: How TO - Labels

metadata.description: Learn about How TO - Labels with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content: Learn how to style labels with CSS. Success Info Warning Danger Other How To Style Labels Step 1) Add HTML: Example Success Info Warning Danger Other Step 2) Add CSS: Example .label { color: white; padding: 8px; } .success {background-color: #04AA6D;} /* Green */ .info {background-color: #2196F3;} /* Blue */ .warning {background-color: #ff9800;} /* Orange */ .danger {background-color: #f44336;} /* Red */ .other {background-color: #e7e7e7; color: black;} /* Gray */ ★ +1

summary: This tutorial covers How TO - Labels concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use How TO - Labels effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples.
